Title: M.I.A.
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Lucas O'Connor, Dan Dietz (story editor), Lucas O'Connor (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Michael Emerson
Plot: The hunt for Shaw takes Root and Reese to a small town in upstate New York where not everything is as idyllic as it seems; Fusco and a former person of interest team up.
